author: CBC News
title: 2 staff members test positive for COVID-19 at care homes in Langley and Surrey
description: Residents at two long term care homes in Langley and Surrey are being monitored for COVID-19 symptoms after two staff members tested positive for the virus.
content:
Residents at two long-term care homes in Langley and Surrey are being monitored for COVID-19 symptoms after two staff members tested positive for the virus.
